name: Dicetris
description:
Dice roller Tetris mashup created for GMTK Jam 2022

Compete with your friends on the global online leaderboard against each other in a game of "DICETRIS". The next game piece you have to place on the gameboard is not decided by chance like in old boring regular Tetris, but by your dice rolling skills!

Use the mouse to control dice rolls. You can either click to get a random roll or drag an arrow to control the roll. Then you need to place a "n-minoe" (a game piece) in a similar fashion to classical Tetris, but you can complete both rows and columns.

Good luck dear player and have fun!
